channel.title: How to fix death to not loose connection?
channel.description:
I still got this thing i can't figure out, it's one of my last problems: When any non-admin dies he/she looses all items and looses connection! Any help will be thanked greatly and gets credits on my client! (To admin/mods/trusted people just tell me and i send my client.java and you may check it out..) [i]Thanks for trying[/i]...
EDIT: this only applies when non-admins dies to NPCs, NOT when going on a PvP death..

item.title: How to fix death to not loose connection?
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

I still got this thing i can’t figure out, it’s one of my last problems:
When any non-admin dies he/she looses all items and looses connection!
Any help will be thanked greatly and gets credits on my client!
(To admin/mods/trusted people just tell me and i send my client.java and you may check it out…)
Thanks for trying…

EDIT: this only applies when non-admins dies to NPCs, NOT when going on a PvP death…

Read full topic
